Articles.Content:
It would be very cool if there was UI integration into the tech tree. When you first start out you have analog displays and eventually as you progress you get a modern looking UI.

See examples here: https://www.reddit.com/r/KerbalSpaceProgram/comments/11otwp3/concept_for_a_modfeature_where_the_ui_upgrades_as/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x&context=3
